title: Chapter 849 - Cleaning Up All Foes
body:
Chapter 849 - Cleaning Up All Foes

“How could it be you!?” The Nine Serenities Netherworld Crow’s eyes widened as it recognized that tall, upright figure. 

It was the same young man he’d encountered a few days prior in Redcloud Ridge!

There, the young man had undergone a grand, taboo Tribulation of Spiritual Revolution. The crow had even attempted to ambush him.

However, the crow would never have guessed that the young man in blue was the expert who’d appeared above Ziluo City like a god or immortal, cutting down a group of Emperors!

“Little crow, let’s have ourselves a nice chat later,” said Su Yi. He was already approaching, and Moonlit Shadow still shone like the radiant moon, gushing with clear radiance.

“Quick, stop him!” shouted the Nine Serenities Netherworld Crow.

Boom!

The Sinful Ghost Monk and Child of Sin attacked together.

The monk activated his skull prayer beads. Tentacle-like protrusions shot out of the lotus platforms of sin beneath his feet, surrounding Su Yi.

The infant took out a bronze weaver’s shuttle, which flew through the air surrounded by the heinous power of sin.

Both evil spirits were utterly terrifying entities strong enough to threaten Profound Serenity Emperors.

But Su...
